# init(subscriptionIDs:)

**Initializer**

Creates an operation for fetching the specified subscriptions.

## Declaration

```swift
convenience init(subscriptionIDs: [CKSubscription.ID])
```

## Parameters

- **subscriptionIDs**: An array of strings where each one is an ID of a subscription that you want to retrieve. This parameter sets the [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKFetchSubscriptionsOperation/subscriptionIDs-714ct] propertyâ€™s value. If you specify `nil`, you must set the `subscriptionIDs` property before you execute the operation.

## Discussion

After creating the operation, assign a closure to the [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKFetchSubscriptionsOperation/fetchSubscriptionCompletionBlock-207ep] property to process the results.

## Creating a Fetch Subscriptions Operation

- **init()**: Creates an empty fetch subscriptions operation.
